<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Eidolon's Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=1046)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Eidolon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=386" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 20-foot emanation around your eidolon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon releases a powerful energy attack that deals 5d6 damage of the type you chose when you took the [Eidolon's Wrath](/Feats.aspx?ID=2911) feat, with a basic Reflex save.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Eidolon's Wrath
